name: Mousse Mural
description: Raidwide magical damage that marks the beginning of the fight.

name: Color Riot
description: Tank buster that targets the closest and furthest player. The raised gun hits the closest player and the lowered gun hits the furthest player. Applies Warm/Cold Tint debuffs that must be alternated.

name: Color Clash
description: Sugar Riot fires her gun into the air. Creates unmarked stack AoEs on healers or role-based stacks depending on the number of shots fired.

name: Sticky Mousse
description: Two players are rooted and take magical damage with a short vuln debuff. They receive a 4 second Mousse Mine debuff that does a stack AoE when it expires.

name: Color Riot
description: Tank buster that targets the closest and furthest player. The raised gun hits the closest player and the lowered gun hits the furthest player. Applies Warm/Cold Tint debuffs that must be alternated.

name: Desert Layer 1
description: Sugar Riot paints cacti on the desert, creating six sets of cacti AoEs that spawn on the arena.

name: Heating Up
description: The marked tank and DPS with Heating Up debuffs explode in a large AoE and inflict damage down debuffs.

name: Sticky Mousse
description: Two players are rooted and take magical damage with a short vuln debuff. They receive a 4 second Mousse Mine debuff that does a stack AoE when it expires.

name: Pudding Graf
description: Sugar Riot jumps to the middle. The next Double Style will tether one role with Normal Paint Bombs and the other role with Winged Paint Bombs.

name: Color Riot
description: Tank buster that targets the closest and furthest player. The raised gun hits the closest player and the lowered gun hits the furthest player. Applies Warm/Cold Tint debuffs that must be alternated.

name: Ready Ore Not
description: Raidwide magical damage. After this, any alive Mu adds will begin to cast Ore-Rigato, which deals damage and inflicts a stacking DoT to all players.

name: Ready Ore Not
description: Raidwide magical damage. After this, any alive Mu adds will begin to cast Ore-Rigato, which deals damage and inflicts a stacking DoT to all players.

name: Color Riot
description: Tank buster that targets the closest and furthest player. The raised gun hits the closest player and the lowered gun hits the furthest player. Applies Warm/Cold Tint debuffs that must be alternated.

name: Mousse Mural
description: Raidwide magical damage that marks the end of the adds phase.

name: Double Style
description: Spawns Sweet Shot arrows at the edge of the arena and either Taste of Fire or Taste of Thunder.

name: Taste of Lightning
description: The screen flashes with lightning. Unmarked AoEs spawn under all players when this happens, and they need to move away from where they were when the flash happened.

name: Lightning Storm
description: One support and one DPS are targeted with a lightning prey marker. This will do an AoE around them and strike the island they are on. This will repeat for all players.

name: Pudding Party
description: A multi-hit stack marker that deals high magical damage. Hits five times.

name: Mousse Drip
description: The furthest two players are targeted with a multi-hit stack AoE. Inflicts a short magic vuln each hit, and leaves behind a puddle. Hits four times.

name: Moussacre
description: Conal AoEs giving a magic vuln on the four closest players.

name: Taste of Lightning
description: The screen flashes with lightning. Unmarked AoEs spawn under all players when this happens, and they need to move away from where they were when the flash happened.

name: Explosion
description: Summons eight towers which must be soaked. Players must bait Taste of Lightning AoEs outside of the tower before going into their tower.

name: Mousse Mural
description: Raidwide magical damage.

name: Sticky Mousse
description: Two players are rooted and take magical damage with a short vuln debuff. They receive a 4 second Mousse Mine debuff that does a stack AoE when it expires.

name: Color Riot
description: Tank buster that targets the closest and furthest player. The raised gun hits the closest player and the lowered gun hits the furthest player. Applies Warm/Cold Tint debuffs that must be alternated.

name: Color Clash
description: Sugar Riot fires her gun into the air. Creates unmarked stack AoEs on healers or role-based stacks depending on the number of shots fired.

name: Artistic Anarchy (Enrage)
description: Enrage wipe mechanic that occurs at 11:24 into the fight.
